nodes.text: The Gamor Run was a hyperspace route in the Mid Rim on which the smuggler Lo Khan made the biggest haul of his career. Khan was saved by Luwingo from a battle with the Galactic Empire on the run.
Leland Chee made it clear that the "Gamor" of this Run and the "Gamorr" from which the Gamorrean species originates are two different things.
